LPC1700CMSIS Standard Peripheral Firmware Library

07_June_2011

This software package contains Standard Peripheral Firmware Driver Library for LPC1700. This package included Macros, Data Types, Structure Types and Functions that are useful in peripheral functionality application without deep-knowledge about LPC1700's peripherals.

The LPC1700CMSIS Standard Peripheral Firmware Library is also complaint with CMSIS.
